summary: An ex-Russian mobster who is now a crime novelist must confront his past when his family is targeted by violence.
cast: Steven Seagal|Mike Dopud|Igor Jijikine|Robert Wisden|Inna Korobkina|Zak Santiago|Andrew Rasputin|Evgeniy Lazarev|Laura Mennell|Aleks Paunovic|Ingrid Torrance|Sergey Nasibov|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Yan-Kay Crystal Lowe|Daniel Cudmore|Gerry South|Dan Rizzuto|Brad Kelly|Ed Anders|Rob 'Sluggo' Boyce|Mike Desabrais|Phillip Mitchell|Robbie Holloway|Linda Minard|Brent Stait|Paul Lazenby|Brad Loree|Hugo Steele|Reg Tupper|Holly Eglinton|Christine Sutcliffe|Colin Lawrence|Darryl Scheelar|Janene Carleton|Josh Blacker|David Hooper|Dan Payne|Todd Scott|Sarah Drzazgowski|Francine Cohen|Rita Edwards|Yasmine Vox|Bob Gunter|Lucia Oskerova
keywords: violence|russian|daughter|thrown through glass|female in bra and panties
director: Director: Jeff King (as Jeff F. King)
title: Ruslan: Venganza de un asesino
